description: EZ Upgrade makes upgrading your notebooks hard drive fast and easy. The AC adapter kit includes an external Hi-Speed USB 2.0 drive enclosure, USB & auxiliary power cable, and EZ Gig II Data Transfer Utility. That’s all you’ll need to transfer applications, settings, data and OS to a new hard drive.Box ContentsEZ Upgrade EnclosureEZ Gig II Data Transfer Utility for Windows1 Meter PS/2 CableUSB CableQuick Start Guide
title: Apricorn EZ-Upgrade SATA Notebook Hard Drive Upgrade Kit with USB 2.0 Connection and Enclosure EZ-UP-UNIVERSAL
